messages.content: You are a model that can do function calling with the following functions
Hi! I'm looking for a 2 bedroom apartment, preferably under $2000.
<think>The user wants to find apartments with 2 bedrooms and a budget of $2000. I should use get_available_listings with bedrooms=[2] and max_rent=2000.</think>

messages.name: get_available_listings
messages.content: {"success": true, "listings": [{"unit_number": "201", "bedrooms": 2, "bathrooms": 1, "rent": 1850, "square_feet": 950, "available_date": "2025-02-01", "pet_friendly": true}], "total_count": 1}

<think>Found one 2-bedroom unit within budget. I should present the details clearly.</think>
Great news! I found a 2-bedroom apartment that fits your budget. Unit 201 is available for $1,850/month. It has 1 bathroom, 950 sq ft, and is pet-friendly. Available starting February 1st. Would you like to schedule a tour?

function.name: get_available_listings
function.description: Search for available apartment listings based on bedroom count and optional maximum rent.

bedrooms.description: List of bedroom counts to search for

messages.content: You are a model that can do function calling with the following functions
What time slots are available for a tour on February 15th?
<think>User wants to check tour availability for February 15th. I need to call get_availability with the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.</think>

<think>There are 4 available time slots. I should list them clearly for the user.</think>
On February 15th, we have the following tour times available: 10:00 AM, 11:00 AM, 2:00 PM, and 3:30 PM. Which time works best for you?

function.name: get_availability
function.description: Get available tour appointment time slots for a specific date.

messages.content: You are a model that can do function calling with the following functions
I'd like to book a tour for March 3rd at 2pm. My name is Sarah Johnson, email sarah@example.com, phone 555-123-4567.
<think>The user provided all required information for booking: date, time, name, email, and phone. I can create the appointment directly.</think>

messages.name: create_appointment
messages.content: {"success": true, "appointment_id": "APT-12345", "message": "Appointment confirmed for March 3, 2025 at 2:00 PM"}

<think>Appointment was successfully created. I should confirm the details with the user.</think>
Perfect, Sarah! Your tour is confirmed for March 3rd at 2:00 PM. You'll receive a confirmation email at sarah@example.com. See you then!
You are a model that can do function calling with the following functions
Do you allow pets? I have a small dog.
<think>The user is asking about pet policy. I should search the knowledge base for pet-related information.</think>

messages.name: search_property_knowledge
messages.content: {"success": true, "results": [{"title": "Pet Policy", "content": "We welcome pets! Dogs and cats under 50 lbs are allowed with a $300 pet deposit and $25/month pet rent. Breed restrictions apply."}]}

<think>Good news for the user - pets are allowed with some conditions.</think>
Yes, we're pet-friendly! Dogs under 50 lbs are welcome. There's a $300 pet deposit and $25/month pet rent. Some breed restrictions apply. Your small dog should be no problem!

function.name: search_property_knowledge
function.description: Search the property knowledge base for information.

messages.content: You are a model that can do function calling with the following functions
I'm interested but not ready to tour yet. Can you save my info? I'm Mike Chen, mike.chen@gmail.com, 555-987-6543.
<think>The user wants to be contacted later. I should save their information as a lead for follow-up.</think>

messages.name: create_lead
messages.content: {"success": true, "lead_id": "LEAD-789", "message": "Lead created successfully"}

<think>Lead was created successfully. The leasing team will follow up.</think>
Got it, Mike! I've saved your contact information. Our leasing team will reach out when you're ready, or feel free to come back anytime to schedule a tour.

function.name: create_lead
function.description: Save prospect contact information for follow-up.

messages.content: You are a model that can do function calling with the following functions
This is frustrating! I've been trying to get help for 20 minutes. I need to speak to a real person.
<think>The user is frustrated and explicitly requesting human assistance. I should escalate immediately.</think>

arguments.reason_for_escalation: User frustrated and requesting human agent after extended wait

messages.name: escalate_conversation
messages.content: {"success": true, "message": "Conversation escalated to human agent", "estimated_wait": "2 minutes"}

<think>Escalation successful. I should apologize and set expectations.</think>
I completely understand your frustration, and I apologize for the inconvenience. I'm connecting you with a leasing agent right now. Someone will be with you in about 2 minutes.

function.name: escalate_conversation
function.description: Transfer the conversation to a human leasing agent.

reason_for_escalation.description: Brief description of why human assistance is needed

messages.name: get_available_listings

I found 2 options for you:

1. Studio (Unit 101) - $1,200/month, 450 sq ft
2. 1-Bedroom (Unit 105) - $1,450/month, 650 sq ft

Both are within your budget. Would you like more details or to schedule a tour?

messages.name: search_property_knowledge

We have covered parking available for $75/month in our garage, which also has EV charging stations. Street parking is free but can be limited. Would you like me to add covered parking to your list of preferences?
